definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive

sentences.english: Even as Abraham believed God, and it was accounted to him for righteousness.
sentences.chinese: 正如，亚伯拉罕信神，这就算为他的义。

sentences.english: As the winds did those of the upper air.
sentences.chinese: 正如秋风把花瓣在空中扬散。

sentences.english: As the Speaker said, we've got more to do.
sentences.chinese: 正如佩洛西所说的，我们还有许多事情要做。

sentences.english: That situation has often been compared to peeling the skins of an onion.
sentences.chinese: 这正如一层一层剥下洋葱皮。

sentences.english: As you can see, there are some consequences with the current arrangement.
sentences.chinese: 正如您所看到的，当前这种安排还存有许多问题。

sentences.english: Like every paradigm throughout history, at some point or another, things change.
sentences.chinese: 正如历史上所有的范例一样，世事常变，无物永驻。

sentences.english: As we understand from your company profile, you are manufacturing of glass beads.
sentences.chinese: 正如我们从您的公司简介了解，你生产的玻璃珠。

sentences.english: To some extent, this is just as McLuhan predicted.
sentences.chinese: 从某种意义上说，这正如麦克卢汉所预言的那样。

sentences.english: This makes as little sense as transiting Penghu to fly from Taipei to Kaohsiung.
sentences.chinese: 岂不正如自台北到高雄，命其须在澎湖中转？

sentences.english: And as we all know, change is often slow and incremental.
sentences.chinese: 正如我们所知，变革往往是缓慢和渐进的。

sentences.english: Dhaucer is buried in "poet's Dorner", as might have been expected.
sentences.chinese: 正如许多人已经预料的，乔叟被葬在“诗人角”。

sentences.english: As you said, here sure have one remanent chicken leg.
sentences.chinese: 正如你说的一样，这里的确还有一只鸡腿没有吃掉。

sentences.english: As is, this wing would be great for kiting or ground handling practice.
sentences.chinese: 正如，这将是永放风筝或地勤的做法很好。

sentences.english: That's all you've ever wanted to be.
sentences.chinese: 正如你一直很想的那样。

sentences.english: A certain amount of dreaming is good, like a narcotic in discreet doses.
sentences.chinese: 一定程度的梦想，正如适量的镇静剂，是好的。

sentences.english: As the proverb says , idle young, needy old.
sentences.chinese: 正如谚语所说，“少壮不努力，老大徒伤悲。”

definition: yes, that's right/variant of 似的[shi4 de5]
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to resemble/to be like/to look as if/such as/appearance/image/portrait/image under a mapping (math.)
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
(emphasizes that sth is precisely or exactly as stated)/precisely/exactly/even/if/just like/in the same way as
